name: Moroccan Lamb
keywords: cumin, lamb, paprika, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 6- to 7-pound leg of lamb, butterflied by your butcher

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the paprika, cumin, coriander, salt, pepper and cardamom. Rub lamb all over with these spices (or 1/2 cup zaatar) and refrigerate for 1 hour.

On a very hot grill or under the broiler, grill or broil lamb, turning once, until cooked to the desired doneness, 10 to 20 minutes for medium rare depending on thickness of the lamb. Let rest on a cutting board for 10 minutes before slicing and serving.
